plot outline: Arjun is a man, who helps his villagers at every step of life. After losing his father as a child, Arjun lives with his mother and maternal uncle's family. He has to face a lot of opposition from the rich and influential people in his village. This story is about how he overcomes obstacles and succeeds in helping his fellow villagers. He also finds his paternal family.
title: Arjun Aamar Naam
